game.name: Motorbike Simulator Stunt Racing
game.description:
All racing bike lovers have already gathered here to enjoy a matchless driving experience! Where are you friends? Join Motorbike Simulator Stunt Racing and be prepared to be a high ground city jumper bike rider! You will have lots of amazing stunts and tricks to perform to become an extreme motorbike rider. So it is not going to be easy at all to set your own high score in this brand new racing challenge. Grab your bike, start the engine and get ready to go on an adventure of a lifetime!

Initially, you find difficulty in understanding all the controls and tricks to gain points. However, staying in the game for some minutes will help you to learn the gameplay and very soon you will see yourself driving perfectly on the amazing roads that will allow you to challenge your stunt performing stunts. Put your creative stunt actions to the test in multiple ramps in this 3D motorcycle simulator! Do not forget to grab the money bags so that you can unlock some more funny objects later.

There are no risks associated with performing the risky and dangerous stunts as this is a 3D realistic-looking virtual world. Grabbing enough points will also help you to unlock more powerful and advanced motorcycles in this bike racing game. The 3 dimension realistic models backed by seamless gameplay, amazing graphics and easy controls will keep you glued to the screen for long. Good luck to guide your bike rider through multiple levels to raise your adrenaline and become an extreme bike rider!
